column4: hello can someone help me with linux not being able to start up from cd and usb? kubuntu crashed my os so i have to reinstall my os. :(
from cd/usb, you can just boot it up live.
it shouldn't touch your os, or even mount your harddrive.

long story short.. tried upgrading 10.04kubuntu to 10.10 got code 1 error.os load until login then it doesnt load.Wrote newest os 11.10 to usb and cd. Both loads in notebook perfectly.Both doesnt load in my pc.Error.. disc boot failure...Replaced cdrom.Same problem. Plz help, im half day messing with it and its tiring
